verses.verse: Then we turned <WH6437> <WH8799>, and took our journey <WH5265> <WH8799> into the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>, as the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto me: and we compassed <WH5437> <WH8799> mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165> many <WH7227> days <WH3117>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Ye have compassed <WH5437> <WH8800> this mountain <WH2022> long enough <WH7227>: turn <WH6437> <WH8798> you northward <WH6828>.

And command <WH6680> <WH8761> thou the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Ye are to pass <WH5674> <WH8802> through the coast <WH1366> of your brethren <WH251> the children <WH1121> of Esav <WH6215>, which dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in Seir <WH8165>; and they shall be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of you: take ye good <WH3966> heed <WH8104> <WH8738> unto yourselves therefore:

Meddle <WH1624> <WH8691> not with them; for I will not give <WH5414> <WH8799> you of their land <WH776>, no, not so much as a foot <WH7272> breadth <WH4096> <WH3709>; because I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165> unto Esav <WH6215> for a possession <WH3425>.

Ye shall buy <WH7666> <WH8799> meat <WH400> of them for money <WH3701>, that ye may eat <WH398> <WH8804>; and ye shall also buy <WH3739> <WH8799> water <WH4325> of them for money <WH3701>, that ye may drink <WH8354> <WH8804>.

For the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> thee in all the works <WH4639> of thy hand <WH3027>: he knoweth <WH3045> <WH8804> thy walking <WH3212> <WH8800> through this great <WH1419> wilderness <WH4057>: these forty <WH705> years <WH8141> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath been with thee; thou hast lacked <WH2637> <WH8804> nothing <WH1697>.

And when we passed <WH5674> <WH8799> by from our brethren <WH251> the children <WH1121> of Esav <WH6215>, which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in Seir <WH8165>, through the way <WH1870> of the plain <WH6160> from Elath <WH359>, and from Eziongaber <WH6100>, we turned <WH6437> <WH8799> and passed <WH5674> <WH8799> by the way <WH1870> of the wilderness <WH4057> of Moab <WH4124>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Distress <WH6696> <WH8799> not the Moabites <WH4124>, neither contend <WH1624> <WH8691> with them in battle <WH4421>: for I will not give <WH5414> <WH8799> thee of their land <WH776> for a possession <WH3425>; because I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> Ar <WH6144> unto the children <WH1121> of Lot <WH3876> for a possession <WH3425>.
The Emims <WH368> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804> therein in times past <WH6440>, a people <WH5971> great <WH1419>, and many <WH7227>, and tall <WH7311> <WH8802>, as the Anakims <WH6062>;
Which <WH1992> also were accounted <WH2803> <WH8735> giants <WH7497>, as the Anakims <WH6062>; but the Moabites <WH4125> call <WH7121> <WH8799> them Emims <WH368>.

The Horims <WH2752> also dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804> in Seir <WH8165> beforetime <WH6440>; but the children <WH1121> of Esav <WH6215> succeeded <WH3423> <WH8799> them, when they had destroyed <WH8045> <WH8686> them from before <WH6440> them, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in their stead; as Yisra'EL <WH3478> did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto the land <WH776> of his possession <WH3425>, which the YY <WH3068> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> unto them.
Now rise up <WH6965> <WH8798>, said I, and get you over <WH5674> <WH8798> the brook <WH5158> Zered <WH2218>. And we went over <WH5674> <WH8799> the brook <WH5158> Zered <WH2218>.

And the space <WH3117> in which we came <WH1980> <WH8804> from Kadeshbarnea <WH6947>, until we were come over <WH5674> <WH8804> the brook <WH5158> Zered <WH2218>, was thirty <WH7970> and eight <WH8083> years <WH8141>; until all the generation <WH1755> of the men <WH582> of war <WH4421> were wasted out <WH8552> <WH8800> from among <WH7130> the host <WH4264>, as the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto them.
For indeed the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> was against them, to destroy <WH2000> <WH8800> them from among <WH7130> the host <WH4264>, until they were consumed <WH8552> <WH8800>.
So it came to pass, when all the men <WH582> of war <WH4421> were consumed <WH8552> <WH8804> and dead <WH4191> <WH8800> from among <WH7130> the people <WH5971>,
That the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Thou art to pass over <WH5674> <WH8802> through Ar <WH6144>, the coast <WH1366> of Moab <WH4124>, this day <WH3117>:

And when thou comest nigh <WH7126> <WH8804> over against <WH4136> the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, distress <WH6696> <WH8799> them not, nor meddle <WH1624> <WH8691> with them: for I will not give <WH5414> <WH8799> thee of the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> any possession <WH3425>; because I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> it unto the children <WH1121> of Lot <WH3876> for a possession <WH3425>.

(That also was accounted <WH2803> <WH8735> a land <WH776> of giants <WH7497>: giants <WH7497> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804> therein in old time <WH6440>; and the Ammonites <WH5984> call <WH7121> <WH8799> them Zamzummims <WH2157>;

A people <WH5971> great <WH1419>, and many <WH7227>, and tall <WH7311> <WH8802>, as the Anakims <WH6062>; but the YY <WH3068> destroyed <WH8045> <WH8686> them before <WH6440> them; and they succeeded <WH3423> <WH8799> them, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in their stead:

As he did <WH6213> <WH8804> to the children <WH1121> of Esav <WH6215>, which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in Seir <WH8165>, when he destroyed <WH8045> <WH8689> the Horims <WH2752> from before <WH6440> them; and they succeeded <WH3423> <WH8799> them, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in their stead even unto this day <WH3117>:

And the Avims <WH5761> which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in Hazerim <WH2699>, even unto Azzah <WH5804>, the Caphtorims <WH3732>, which came forth <WH3318> <WH8802> out of Caphtor <WH3731>, destroyed <WH8045> <WH8689> them, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in their stead.)

Rise ye up <WH6965> <WH8798>, take your journey <WH5265> <WH8798>, and pass over <WH5674> <WH8798> the river <WH5158> Arnon <WH769>: behold <WH7200> <WH8798>, I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> into thine hand <WH3027> Sichon <WH5511> the Amorite <WH567>, king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, and his land <WH776>: begin <WH2490> <WH8685> to possess <WH3423> <WH8798> it, and contend <WH1624> <WH8690> with him in battle <WH4421>.

This day <WH3117> will I begin <WH2490> <WH8686> to put <WH5414> <WH8800> the dread <WH6343> of thee and the fear <WH3374> of thee upon the nations <WH6440> <WH5971> that are under the whole heaven <WH8064>, who shall hear <WH8085> <WH8799> report <WH8088> of thee, and shall tremble <WH7264> <WH8804>, and be in anguish <WH2342> <WH8804> because of thee <WH6440>.

And I sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> out of the wilderness <WH4057> of Kedemoth <WH6932> unto Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809> with words <WH1697> of peace <WH7965>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Let me pass <WH5674> <WH8799> through thy land <WH776>: I will go <WH3212> <WH8799> along by the high way <WH1870> <WH1870>, I will neither turn <WH5493> <WH8799> unto the right hand <WH3225> nor to the left <WH8040>.

Thou shalt sell <WH7666> <WH8686> me meat <WH400> for money <WH3701>, that I may eat <WH398> <WH8804>; and give <WH5414> <WH8799> me water <WH4325> for money <WH3701>, that I may drink <WH8354> <WH8804>: only I will pass through <WH5674> <WH8799> on my feet <WH7272>;

(As the children <WH1121> of Esav <WH6215> which dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in Seir <WH8165>, and the Moabites <WH4125> which dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in Ar <WH6144>, did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto me;) until I shall pass over <WH5674> <WH8799> Yarden <WH3383> into the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> us.

But Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809> would <WH14> <WH8804> not let us pass <WH5674> <WH8687> by him: for the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hardened <WH7185> <WH8689> his spirit <WH7307>, and made his heart <WH3824> obstinate <WH553> <WH8765>, that he might deliver <WH5414> <WH8800> him into thy hand <WH3027>, as appeareth this day <WH3117>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Behold <WH7200> <WH8798>, I have begun <WH2490> <WH8689> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> Sichon <WH5511> and his land <WH776> before <WH6440> thee: begin <WH2490> <WH8685> to possess <WH3423> <WH8798>, that thou mayest inherit <WH3423> <WH8800> his land <WH776>.
Then Sichon <WH5511> came out <WH3318> <WH8799> against <WH7125> <WH8800> us, he and all his people <WH5971>, to fight <WH4421> at YAHaz <WH3096>.
And the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> him before <WH6440> us; and we smote <WH5221> <WH8686> him, and his sons <WH1121>, and all his people <WH5971>.

And we took <WH3920> <WH8799> all his cities <WH5892> at that time <WH6256>, and utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8686> the men <WH4962>, and the women <WH802>, and the little ones <WH2945>, of every city <WH5892>, we left <WH7604> <WH8689> none to remain <WH8300>:
Only the cattle <WH929> we took for a prey <WH962> <WH8804> unto ourselves, and the spoil <WH7998> of the cities <WH5892> which we took <WH3920> <WH8804>.

From Aroer <WH6177>, which is by the brink <WH8193> of the river <WH5158> of Arnon <WH769>, and from the city <WH5892> that is by the river <WH5158>, even unto Gil`ad <WH1568>, there was not one city <WH7151> too strong <WH7682> <WH8804> for us: the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> all unto us <WH6440>:

Only unto the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> thou camest <WH7126> <WH8804> not, nor unto any place <WH3027> of the river <WH5158> Yabok <WH2999>, nor unto the cities <WH5892> in the mountains <WH2022>, nor unto whatsoever the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> forbad <WH6680> <WH8765> us.
